H0.text: Which Italian artist painted 'The School of Athens'. Leonardo da Vinci

H1.text: Which Italian artist painted 'The School of Athens'. Michelangelo Buonarroti

H2.text: Which Italian artist painted 'The School of Athens'. Sandro Botticelli

H3.text: Which Italian artist painted 'The School of Athens'. Sanzio

A4.text: The best known work is The School of Athens in the Vatican Stanza della Segnatura.

A5.text: The frescoed Raphael Rooms were the central, and the largest, work of his career.
